text: Baba Garib Asthan Mandir is one of the oldest temple of lord Shiva situated in Muzaffarpur in the Indian state of Bihar.http://www.garibnathdham.in/ ==Location== The temple is located at the Purani bazar area of Muzaffarpur.http://www.garibnathdham.in/ ==References== Category:Hindu temples in Bihar Category:Buildings and structures in Muzaffarpur Category:Shiva_temples_in_Bihar
title: Baba Garib Sthan Mandir
